contents.text: Welcome to Apteligent in San Francisco, your partner in mobile app analytics and performance optimization.
For sales and new business inquiries, please press 1.
To learn more about our mobile analytics and user experience solutions, please press 1.
Please hold while we connect you with a sales representative.

navigationGoals: I need a concise overview of your mobile analytics and UX optimization solution
Get information on integrating Apteligent analytics into our veteran support mobile app
I want an overview of Apteligent’s mobile analytics SDK architecture and core feature set for integrating into our app.
I’d like to speak with someone about signing up for your service and learning how it works.
I’d like an overview of how Apteligent’s mobile analytics tools can help me track performance metrics in my physics study app.

contents.text: To discuss pricing, demos, or partnership opportunities, please press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our pricing and demos team.

navigationGoals: I want to discuss pricing details and arrange a product demo
Request a demo and pricing details for using Apteligent in my nonprofit’s veterans resource app
I'd like to schedule a live technical demo of your UX analytics dashboard and get detailed enterprise pricing tiers.
I need information on your pricing plans and would like to see a demonstration.
I want to schedule a demo and get pricing details for Apteligent’s analytics platform for my university research project.

contents.text: For technical support and troubleshooting, please press 2.
To report a new app issue or bug, please press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to technical support.

navigationGoals: I need to report a new app bug and get immediate troubleshooting
Report a new crash bug I’m seeing in the SDK of our veterans outreach app
I've encountered a crash in the Android SDK causing ANRs—I'd like to file a new support ticket with debug logs.
I want to report a new bug I’m seeing in my app and get help fixing it.
I need to report a new bug in the Apteligent dashboard—the crash logs aren’t uploading correctly.

contents.text: To check the status of an existing support ticket, please press 2.
Please hold while we retrieve your ticket information.

navigationGoals: I’d like a quick status update on my existing support ticket
Check the status of my existing support ticket for the crash issue in our veterans app
Can you retrieve the current status of my existing ticket about the Android SDK crash reporting issue?
I’d like an update on the support ticket I opened earlier.
I’d like an update on the support ticket I opened about missing session data in my analytics reports.
